text: The Senate () is the upper house of the Cortes Generales of Spain. It is part of the Cortes Generales along with the Congress of Deputiesâ€”the lower chamber. The Senate meets in the Palace of the Senate in Madrid. The Senate is made-up of senators, each of whom represents a province, an autonomous city or an autonomous community. ==Other websites== * Category:Government of Spain
title: Senate of Spain
